title: Documenting Non-Academic Learning Outcomes: Portfolio-Based Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and relevant work experience
context.additional_context: A course for working professionals to systematically document non-academic mathematical learning outcomes acquired during work

learning_goals: Learners can produce a Carter Classification System-based portfolio within a week and specify five or more concrete work-related mathematics learning outcomes
Learners can explain methods to convert three informal learning cases from weekly work activities into learning outcomes using mobile apps
Learners can visually represent their learning outcomes through project deliverables incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
